Name: Link the Animals
About the game: Link the Animals is a relaxing, challenging puzzle game where you need to connect each animal with its respective pair. The level ends when all pairs are connected. 5 difficulty levels More than 340 challenging puzzles 20+ animals and other creatures The game is available for Windows , Mac , Linux , Android and iOS .
